EmailTemplate.name: RFI
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - We need information for your {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential_Type__c} license application by {!MUSW__License2__c.Days_From_Today_120__c}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We need the following by {!MUSW__License2__c.Days_From_Today_120__c} for your {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential_Type__c} license application:
[Rich text free text box to enter list of missing/unacceptable information/documents and needed correction]
Submit the information through our new online system:
Go to {!MUSW__License2__c.Portal_URL__c}. Sign in or create an account and follow instructions.
We need the information or documents by {!MUSW__License2__c.Days_From_Today_120__c}, or we’ll close your application and you’ll have to start over.
Questions? Need help? {!MUSW__License2__c.Application_Type__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Program_Email__c} {!MUSW__License2__c.Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov GEN002
